package.name: amcl6d
package.description:
This package provides nodes for performing an adaptive Monte-Carlo localization in 3D polygon maps.
It samples numerous poses into the map and simulates raytraces. The results of the raytraces are compared to the input sensor data from the robot, usually a kinect camera or a laser scanner.
Make sure that you configure the CamParams in the cgal_raytracer package accordingly.
There are multiple example launch files provided which will help to easily set up a localization.
package.author: Sebastian Höffner
